attributes.action: Sports Personality of the Year should be awarded to Team GB as a whole. It's unfair to choose between them.
attributes.additional_details: Team GB have performed so well as a team at the Olympics that it would be very unfair to select one single 'Sports Personality of the Year'. We would like the government to persuade the BBC to honour Team GB as a whole.

rejection.details: The BBC are responsible for the "Sports Personality of the Year".
